author: scottbw
msg: Allow a "?format=" parameter to override the Accepts header, rather than be used only as a fallback when the header is missing. This makes interactive testing of APIs easier.

author: mturk
msg: Add global jk_map id. Similar to uri mappings this is for getting the unique context where workers gets created

author: fchrist
msg: STANBOL-557 Merged NOTICE and LICENSE changes

author: rmannibucau
msg: the context used in OpenEJBPerRequestResourceProvider can be the app context so if lookups in this context fails we can try using the current context (new InitialContext))
